message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,200,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1,500,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still seeking a price closer to my initial proposal.  How about we meet halfway at $1,850,000? This reflects the true value of the product.

I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $1,400,000. I think this is a reasonable compromise considering the product's value to me.
